definition: Cambrian geological period (541-485.4 million years ago)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago

pinyin: Han2 wu3 ji4 da4 bao4 fa1
Han2 wu3 ji4 sheng1 ming4 da4 bao4 fa1

sentences.english: It means that the transgression in the Early Ordovician was more extensive than that in the Cambrian .
sentences.chinese: 这表明早奥陶世的海进比寒武纪的更甚了。

sentences.english: The Precambrian metamorphic rocks in Northern Fujian are the important part consisting of the Cathaysian palaeocontinental basement.
sentences.chinese: 闻北前寒武纪变质岩是华夏古陆基底的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: It is overlain unconformably by the post Cambrian platform cover.
sentences.chinese: 被后寒武纪地台沉积盖层不整合覆盖。

sentences.english: The lithofacies palaeogeographic characteristics were quite different from those of the Cambrian.
sentences.chinese: 这与该地区寒武纪的岩相古地理格局大不相同。

sentences.english: This paper is a continuation of Lithofacies palaeography of the Cambrian in Tarim area.
sentences.chinese: 本文是《塔里木地区寒武纪岩相古地理》一文的延续。

sentences.english: Late Precambrian mafic dyke swarms are extensively developed in the central North China Craton.
sentences.chinese: 华北克拉通中部广泛发育晚前寒武纪镁铁质岩墙群。

sentences.english: Precambrian geology is one of the major research fields of earth sciences.
sentences.chinese: 前寒武纪地质学是地球科学的主要研究领域之一。

sentences.english: In the Cambrian there were no fossil bryozoans found anywhere in the world.
sentences.chinese: 寒武纪没有化石苔藓动物的任何记录。

pinyin: Han2 wu3 ji4 da4 bao4 fa1

definition: Phanerozoic, geological eon lasting since the Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪[Han2 wu3 ji4], c. 540m year ago

pinyin: Han2 wu3 ji4 sheng1 ming4 da4 bao4 fa1

definition: pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
